description.p: Developed engineering software, performed data and drilling dynamics analysis.\nolinebreak[4]

bulletedlist.item: Conducted BHA failure analysis based on surface and downhole data.
Developed FEA-based software with a C# UI to analyze drill string deflections, stresses, frequencies, and mode shapes to assess bending and stress limits.

Developed a C# software application that automated data cleaning and processing. The application used specialized algorithms to automatically separate drilling and non-drilling time, reducing analysis time by 97\%.
